00052               I_ASSIGN(m_wizardStyleAttrPtr, "WizardStyle", "Set the look of the wizard UI\n0 - Classic\n1 - Modern\n2 - MacStyle\n3 - Aero", false, 0);
00053        I_END_COMPONENT;
